
            <h1 class="postTitle">
                <a id="cb_post_title_url" class="postTitle2 vertical-middle" href="https://www.cnblogs.com/cj8988/p/18984186" title="发布于 2025-07-14 16:02">
    <span role="heading" aria-level="2">图片生成对嘴视频FLOAT</span>
    

</a>

            </h1>
            <div class="clear"></div>
            <div class="postBody">
                <div id="cnblogs_post_body" class="blogpost-body blogpost-body-html">
<p>之前已经介绍过图片对嘴生成视频的开源工具：</p>
<p><strong><a href="https://github.com/toto222/DICE-Talk" rel="noopener nofollow" target="_blank">DICE-Talk</a>：<a href="https://www.cnblogs.com/cj8988/p/18957718" target="_blank">https://www.cnblogs.com/cj8988/p/18957718</a>&nbsp; &nbsp;（带表情，比较慢）</strong></p>
<p><strong><a href="https://www.cnblogs.com/cj8988/p/18952604" target="_blank">ComfyUI_Sonic</a>：<a href="https://www.cnblogs.com/cj8988/p/18952604" target="_blank">https://www.cnblogs.com/cj8988/p/18952604</a> （基础版）</strong></p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p><strong>本章在介绍一个图片生成对嘴视频的开源框架，带表情，生成比较快的。</strong></p>
<p><strong><span style="font-size: 16px"><a id="contextregion-repositorycrumb-float-link" class="AppHeader-context-item" href="https://github.com/deepbrainai-research/float" data-target="context-region-crumb.linkElement" data-analytics-event="{&quot;category&quot;:&quot;SiteHeaderComponent&quot;,&quot;action&quot;:&quot;context_region_crumb&quot;,&quot;label&quot;:&quot;float&quot;,&quot;screen_size&quot;:&quot;full&quot;}" data-view-component="true" rel="noopener nofollow"><span class="AppHeader-context-item-label " data-target="context-region-crumb.labelElement">float</span></a>&nbsp;:&nbsp;<a href="https://github.com/deepbrainai-research/float" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow">https://github.com/deepbrainai-research/float</a></span><br></strong></p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p><strong><span style="font-size: 16px">我这里使用集合ComfyUI版本：<a href="https://github.com/yuvraj108c/ComfyUI-FLOAT" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow">https://github.com/yuvraj108c/ComfyUI-FLOAT</a></span></strong></p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<h3><strong>一：下载源码</strong></h3>
<p><strong><span style="font-size: 16px">地址：<strong><a href="https://github.com/yuvraj108c/ComfyUI-FLOAT" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow">https://github.com/yuvraj108c/ComfyUI-FLOAT</a></strong></span></strong></p>
<p><strong><span style="font-size: 16px">下载到指定目录：\ComfyUI\custom_nodes\</span></strong></p>
<p><img alt="" loading="lazy" data-src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/692485/202507/692485-20250714153656783-1833995019.png" class="lazyload"></p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<h3>二：下载模型</h3>
<p><span style="font-size: 16px">&nbsp;地址：<a href="https://huggingface.co/yuvraj108c/float/tree/main" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow">https://huggingface.co/yuvraj108c/float/tree/main</a></span></p>
<p><span style="font-size: 16px">下载到指定目录：\ComfyUI\models\float\</span></p>
<p><img alt="" width="816" height="241" loading="lazy" data-src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/692485/202507/692485-20250714153954104-1110793025.png" class="lazyload"></p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p><img alt="" width="794" height="237" loading="lazy" data-src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/692485/202507/692485-20250714153819401-1540231136.png" class="lazyload"></p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<h3>三：安装插件</h3>
<div class="cnblogs_code">
<pre>cd ./ComfyUI-<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">FLOAT
pip install </span>-r requirements.txt</pre>
</div>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<h3>四：运行</h3>
<div class="cnblogs_code">
<pre>python  main.py<br><br>运行成功后，浏览器访问<br>http://127.0.0.1:8188/</pre>
</div>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p>然后将模板文件json拖拽进去：\ComfyUI\custom_nodes\ComfyUI-FLOAT\float_workflow.json</p>
<p><img alt="" width="1009" height="760" loading="lazy" data-src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/692485/202507/692485-20250714154249360-1162816863.png" class="lazyload"></p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<h3>五：使用</h3>
<p>上传一张图片，和一段音频，很快就生成了一个视频。<strong>图片必须是512*512尺寸的，其他尺寸都会被裁剪。</strong></p>
<p><img alt="" width="1003" height="786" loading="lazy" data-src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/692485/202507/692485-20250714154420083-336102040.png" class="lazyload"></p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p>比较一下：</p>
<table>
<tbody>
<tr class="table-header ng-star-inserted">
<td class="ng-star-inserted"><span class="ng-star-inserted">特性</span></td>
<td class="ng-star-inserted"><span class="ng-star-inserted">ComfyUI_Sonic (新一代)</span></td>
<td class="ng-star-inserted"><span class="ng-star-inserted">ComfyUI-FLOAT (上一代)</span></td>
<td class="ng-star-inserted"><span class="ng-star-inserted">优胜者 &amp; 原因</span></td>
</tr>
<tr class="ng-star-inserted">
<td class="ng-star-inserted"><strong class="ng-star-inserted">核心技术</strong></td>
<td class="ng-star-inserted"><strong class="ng-star-inserted">与语言无关 (Language-Agnostic)</strong><span class="ng-star-inserted">。直接从音频波形提取特征 (HuBERT)，驱动面部运动。</span></td>
<td class="ng-star-inserted"><strong class="ng-star-inserted">依赖于特定语言的ASR</strong><span class="ng-star-inserted">。将语音转为音素，再由音素驱动嘴唇。</span></td>
<td class="ng-star-inserted"><span class="ng-star-inserted">🏆&nbsp;<strong class="ng-star-inserted">Sonic</strong><span class="ng-star-inserted">: 先进的技术路线，使其天生支持任何语言。</span></span></td>
</tr>
<tr class="ng-star-inserted">
<td class="ng-star-inserted"><strong class="ng-star-inserted">中文支持</strong></td>
<td class="ng-star-inserted"><span class="ng-star-inserted">✅&nbsp;<strong class="ng-star-inserted">完美支持</strong><span class="ng-star-inserted">。无需任何修改，直接输入中文音频即可。</span></span></td>
<td class="ng-star-inserted"><span class="ng-star-inserted"><strong class="ng-star-inserted">✅&nbsp;支持</strong><span class="ng-star-inserted">。其核心模块是为英语设计的，如果是中文，表情方面处理不好。</span></span></td>
<td class="ng-star-inserted"><span class="ng-star-inserted">🏆&nbsp;<strong class="ng-star-inserted">Sonic</strong><span class="ng-star-inserted">: 这是最关键的区别，Sonic 开箱即用。</span></span></td>
</tr>
<tr class="ng-star-inserted">
<td class="ng-star-inserted"><strong class="ng-star-inserted">生成速度</strong></td>
<td class="ng-star-inserted"><span class="ng-star-inserted">🚀&nbsp;<strong class="ng-star-inserted">极快</strong><span class="ng-star-inserted">&nbsp;(接近实时)。模型轻量、高效。</span></span></td>
<td class="ng-star-inserted"><span class="ng-star-inserted">🐢&nbsp;<strong class="ng-star-inserted">较慢</strong><span class="ng-star-inserted">。涉及多个串联的、较重的模型，流程更长。</span></span></td>
<td class="ng-star-inserted"><span class="ng-star-inserted">🏆&nbsp;<strong class="ng-star-inserted">Sonic</strong><span class="ng-star-inserted">: 效率上是碾压性的优势。</span></span></td>
</tr>
<tr class="ng-star-inserted">
<td class="ng-star-inserted"><strong class="ng-star-inserted">口型精度</strong></td>
<td class="ng-star-inserted"><span class="ng-star-inserted">✨&nbsp;<strong class="ng-star-inserted">非常高</strong><span class="ng-star-inserted">。能够捕捉细微的发音，口型清晰、准确。</span></span></td>
<td class="ng-star-inserted"><span class="ng-star-inserted">😐&nbsp;<strong class="ng-star-inserted">一般</strong><span class="ng-star-inserted">。基于音素的生成方式有时会产生“平均嘴型”，不够精细。</span></span></td>
<td class="ng-star-inserted"><span class="ng-star-inserted">🏆&nbsp;<strong class="ng-star-inserted">Sonic</strong><span class="ng-star-inserted">: 口型同步的质量更高。</span></span></td>
</tr>
<tr class="ng-star-inserted">
<td class="ng-star-inserted"><strong class="ng-star-inserted">资源占用 (VRAM)</strong></td>
<td class="ng-star-inserted"><span class="ng-star-inserted">💧&nbsp;<strong class="ng-star-inserted">较低</strong><span class="ng-star-inserted">。对硬件更友好。</span></span></td>
<td class="ng-star-inserted"><span class="ng-star-inserted">🔥&nbsp;<strong class="ng-star-inserted">较高</strong><span class="ng-star-inserted">。需要同时加载多个模型。</span></span></td>
<td class="ng-star-inserted"><span class="ng-star-inserted">🏆&nbsp;<strong class="ng-star-inserted">Sonic</strong><span class="ng-star-inserted">: 更适合大众用户的硬件配置。</span></span></td>
</tr>
<tr class="ng-star-inserted">
<td class="ng-star-inserted"><strong class="ng-star-inserted">头部姿态</strong></td>
<td class="ng-star-inserted"><span class="ng-star-inserted">头部基本静止。</span></td>
<td class="ng-star-inserted"><span class="ng-star-inserted">头部会动，但是尺寸会裁剪为512*512。</span></td>
<td class="ng-star-inserted"><span class="ng-star-inserted">🤝&nbsp;<strong class="ng-star-inserted">平手</strong><span class="ng-star-inserted">: 两者默认都不生成头部运动。</span></span></td>
</tr>
<tr class="ng-star-inserted">
<td class="ng-star-inserted"><strong class="ng-star-inserted">面部表情</strong></td>
<td class="ng-star-inserted"><span class="ng-star-inserted">主要驱动口周区域，表情变化有限。</span></td>
<td class="ng-star-inserted"><span class="ng-star-inserted">✅&nbsp;<strong class="ng-star-inserted">有专门的情感识别模块</strong><span class="ng-star-inserted">，可以驱动眉毛等表情。</span></span></td>
<td class="ng-star-inserted"><span class="ng-star-inserted">🏆&nbsp;<strong class="ng-star-inserted">FLOAT</strong><span class="ng-star-inserted">: 这是 FLOAT 理论上的唯一优势，但受限于其只支持英文。</span></span></td>
</tr>
<tr class="ng-star-inserted">
<td class="ng-star-inserted"><strong class="ng-star-inserted">安装与配置</strong></td>
<td class="ng-star-inserted"><span class="ng-star-inserted">简单，通过 ComfyUI Manager 一键安装，模型依赖清晰。</span></td>
<td class="ng-star-inserted"><span class="ng-star-inserted">复杂，模型依赖多且容易出错（正如你遇到的问题）。</span></td>
<td class="ng-star-inserted"><span class="ng-star-inserted">🏆&nbsp;<strong class="ng-star-inserted">Sonic</strong><span class="ng-star-inserted">: 用户体验更好，更不容易出问题。</span></span></td>
</tr>
</tbody>
